mapper.insert: insert into alg_article (atl_sn, title, abstract, keywords, doi, author, cite_info) values (#{atlSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update alg_article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abstract = #{abstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doi = #{doi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cite_info = #{citeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where atl_sn = #{atlSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select atl_sn, title, abstract, keywords, doi, author, cite_info from alg_article
